name: Glitched Gun
description:
Description: You are placed in a game with 9 other real players in this game try survive for as long as you can in the FREE FOR ALL CRAZINESS. Each gun can some times have random bugs/glitches that can either be a buff on your part or a major debuff. Good luck!

LINUX & MAC builds have been not been tested!

Controls:

W,A,S,D , Space -> MOVEMENT

Mouse(Left) -> Pickup, Shoot

Your best chance of finding other people is clicking the "Join Random" button!

Intentional Bugs:
Random Damage, Random Shoot Time, Random Jump Force, Gun randomly deleting?,

Can pickup multiple guns(This was me being lazy :D)

EXTRA: I decided to see if i could limit test my self for the wowie jam. I had a lot of fun making this multiplayer game. As i have made a multiplayer game in just 2 days there will be plenty of UNINTENTIONAL bugs over the intentional ones i implemented. Hopefully you guys enjoy what it is so far!

Happy deving!
